file_content.text: [The Gand's electronic signaling device has three signal lights on it, but it seems inactive.]
[The Gand's electronic signaling device has three signal lights on it.]
[The first shows a school of fish; the second, a pack of akk dogs; and the third, a mighty rancor.]
[The first signal lights, informing the Gand to change who carries the holocron.]
[The second signal lights, informing the Gand to change who carries the holocron.]
I think I understand how this works.
[The third signal lights, informing the Gand to change who carries the holocron.]
